<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sn_hr_core_case</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Flags</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	if (current.subject_person) {
		g_scratchpad.sp_vip = current.subject_person.vip;
		g_scratchpad.sp_ht = current.subject_person.u_high_need;
	}
	
	if (current.opened_for) {
		g_scratchpad.of_vip = current.opened_for.vip;
		g_scratchpad.of_ht = current.opened_for.u_high_need;
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>tim_deniston</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-08-06 14:31:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0a4dd4e6db03f300bd00f8ecbf9619d6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Flags</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Human Resources: Core" source="sn_hr_core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Human Resources: Core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_0a4dd4e6db03f300bd00f8ecbf9619d6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>tim_deniston</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-08-06 14:32:01</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0a4dd4e6db03f300bd00f8ecbf9619d6"/></record_update>
